Module dev.kkorolyov.pancake.core
Package dev.kkorolyov.pancake.core.component

Class Go

java.lang.Object
dev.kkorolyov.pancake.core.component.Go
All Implemented Interfaces:
dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.entity.Component
public final class Go extends Object implements dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.entity.Component
Ephemeral marker of where an entity wants to go and how intent it is on getting there.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Go(dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.math.Vector3 target, double strength, double proximity, boolean snap)
    Constructs a new go component with position target, strength of force to apply, proximity radius around target considered as this component's entity having reached its target, and whether to snap position within proximity of target.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    double
    getProximity()
    Returns the radius around the target to consider as having reached the target.
    double
    getStrength()
    Returns the intended force magnitude to get to the target.
    dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.math.Vector3
    getTarget()
    Returns the mutable intended position.
    boolean
    isSnap()
    Returns whether the owning entity's position should be set to exactly this component's target once it is within proximity.
    void
    setProximity(double proximity)
    Sets the radius around the target to consider as having reached the target to buffer.
    void
    setSnap(boolean snap)
    Sets whether the owning entity's position should be set to exactly this component's target once it is within proximity to snap.
    void
    setStrength(double strength)
    Sets the intended force magnitude to get to the target to strength.
